definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: This rule nullifies the "little brother" argument.
sentences.chinese: 这条规则否定的“小兄弟”的论点。

sentences.english: I always get a negative response.
sentences.chinese: 我向来都得到否定的回答。

sentences.english: Without you deny yourself, think about what other people live.
sentences.chinese: 不要自我否定，想想其他人是怎么过的。

sentences.english: A rigid outboard support system negates spindle deflection.
sentences.chinese: 僵化的舷外支持系统的否定主轴偏转。

sentences.english: Ambiguity from the negative scope is much more in English than Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 英语中因否定范围不清而导致的歧义远多胜于汉语。

sentences.english: Once the belief thease disappeared. i, a word denied all the past.
sentences.chinese: 曾经的信仰灰飞烟灭，一句话否定了所有的过往。

sentences.english: He dismisses the theory that Etna is from a Greek source meaning “I burn.”
sentences.chinese: 他否定了埃特纳来源于希腊语“我在燃烧”的说法。

sentences.english: If negativity does happen, it will probably come unexpectedly.
sentences.chinese: 如果否定性发生，它将意想不到地大概来。

sentences.english: All of these values were negated.
sentences.chinese: 所有的那些价值观都被否定。

sentences.english: Another question is, how should the expression be negated?
sentences.chinese: 另一个问题是，表达式应该如何被否定？

sentences.english: He denies that his prophecy is self-denying.
sentences.chinese: 他对于自己的预言是自相矛盾的说法予以了否定。

sentences.english: It denies that any essential differences exist between the natural sciences and the sciences of human action.
sentences.chinese: 他们否定了自然科学和人类行为科学的本质区别。

sentences.english: Now in each case you have instances of knowledge as negation.
sentences.chinese: 在每一个场合你都有”否定知识”的体验。

sentences.english: From its formation we can easily define it refers to both double negative sentence and imperative sentence.
sentences.chinese: 仅从形式上看，它就与双重否定句和祈使句都有交叉。

sentences.english: However, we can not be negated.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我们不能全盘否定。

sentences.english: I establish my lucidity in the midst of what negates it.
sentences.chinese: 我将我的清醒置于了对它的否定之中。

definition: to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to declare to be untrue/to deny
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to erase/to cover traces/to obliterate evidence/to expunge/to blot out/to suppress
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
